Joystick

Direct access to joystick

Joystick_Read
u8 Joystick_Read(
u8 port
) __FASTCALL

Get the current joystick information

Parameters
port
u8

JOY_PORT_1 or JOY_PORT_2

Returns

Joystick state (bit=0: pressed)

xxBARLDU
  │││││└─ Up
  ││││└── Down
  │││└─── Left
  ││└──── Right
  │└───── Trigger A
  └────── Trigger B
Joystick_GetDirection
u8 Joystick_GetDirection(
u8 port
) __FASTCALL

Get current direction of the given joystick

Parameters
port
u8

JOY_PORT_1 or JOY_PORT_2

Returns

One or two of those defines:

JOY_INPUT_DIR_NONE
JOY_INPUT_DIR_UP
JOY_INPUT_DIR_DOWN
JOY_INPUT_DIR_LEFT
JOY_INPUT_DIR_RIGHT
Joystick_GetTrigger
inline u8 Joystick_GetTrigger(
u8 port,
u8 trigger
)

Get current trigger status of the given joystick (0: released; 1: pressed)

Parameters
port
u8

JOY_PORT_1 or JOY_PORT_2

trigger
u8

JOY_INPUT_TRIGGER_A or JOY_INPUT_TRIGGER_B

Keyboard

u8 Keyboard_Read(
u8 row
) __FASTCALL

Read keyboard matrix row

Parameters
row
u8

The row to read (0-10)

Keyboard_Update
bool Keyboard_Update()

Update all keyboard rows at once

Keyboard_IsKeyPressed
bool Keyboard_IsKeyPressed(
u8 key
)

Check if a given key is pressed

Keyboard_IsKeyPushed
bool Keyboard_IsKeyPushed(
u8 key
)

Check if a given key is just pushed
